hero.title: Kubaka ejo hazaza na Claude AI
hero.subtitle: Injira muri Claude Builder Club ya mbere mu Rwanda. Wige iterambere rya AI, ufatanye ku mishinga ifite akamaro, kandi ube igice cy'umuryango w'abahinduye ibintu muri Kaminuza y'u Rwanda.

features.title: Kubaka Ibisubizo bya AI ku Rwanda
features.subtitle: Duhuza ubwenge bushakashaka kugira ngo twige, tubake, kandi dushyire mu bikorwa ibisubizo bya AI byiganira ibibazo nyabyo mu muryango wacu.

learn.title: Wige Iterambere rya AI
learn.description: Menya ubuhanga bwo gukoresha prompt, gukoresha Claude API, no kubaka porogaramu zifite ubwenge binyuze mu mahugurwa akora ku buryo nyabwo.

build.title: Kora Imishinga Nyayo
build.description: Kora ku mishinga ifite intego ikemura ibibazo by'aho uri mu buzima busanzwe, uburezi, ubuhinzi, n'ibindi.

connect.title: Huza & Kura
connect.description: Huza n'abandi bubatsi, abakozi b'inganda, n'umuryango mpuzamahanga wa Anthropic w'abahanga mu iterambere.

showcase.title: Erekana Akazi Kawe
showcase.description: Tanga imishinga yawe mu minsi yo kwerekana, amarushanwa, kandi uhabwe icyubahiro ku bisubizo byawe bishya.

events.title: Injira mu Gice Gikurikira
events.subtitle: Kuva mu mahugurwa kugera ku marushanwa, hari ikintu gihoraho muri CBC-UR.

projects.title: Icyo Turimo Kubaka
projects.subtitle: Shakisha ibisubizo bishya bya AI byakozwe n'abanyamuryango bacu.

cta.title: Witeguye Gutangira Kubaka?
cta.subtitle: Injira muri Claude Builder Club ube igice cy'umuryango w'ibishya bya AI mu Rwanda. Niba uri umutangizi cyangwa umuhanga mu iterambere, hari umwanya wawe.

header.title: Guha Imbaraga Abubatsi ba AI mu Rwanda
header.subtitle: Claude Builder Club muri Kaminuza y'u Rwanda ni umuryango uyobowe n'abanyeshuri wiyemeje kwiga, kubaka, no guhindura ibintu ukoresheje ikoranabuhanga rya AI.

mission.title: Impamvu Turiho
mission.description: Twizera ko buri munyeshuri akwiye kubona uburezi bwa AI bugezweho n'amahirwe yo kubaka ibisubizo bifite akamaro. Intego yacu ni ugushiraho ibidukikije bishyigikira aho ubwenge bushakashaka bushobora gushakisha ikoranabuhanga rya AI, gukura ubuhanga nyabwo, no guhanga ingaruka mu miryango yabo.

vision.title: Icyerekezo Cyacu
vision.description: Kuba umuryango w'abanyeshuri ba AI uyobora muri Afurika y'Iburasirazuba, utanga ibisubizo bishya n'abahanga ba AI bakora impinduka nziza.

team.title: Menya Itsinda Ryacu
team.subtitle: Abanyeshuri bishimiye bayobora mu burezi bwa AI no guhindura ibintu.

timeline.title: Uko Twageze Hano
timeline.subtitle: Kuva ku igitekerezo kugeza ku muryango ukura w'abubatsi ba AI.

partners.title: Dushyigikiwe Na
partners.subtitle: Twishimiye gufatanya n'imiryango igabana icyerekezo cyacu cyo kwigisha AI.

header.title: Wige, Ubake, Uhuze
header.subtitle: Injira mu mahugurwa yacu, amarushanwa, n'amahuriro kugira ngo uzamure ubuhanga bwawe bwa AI kandi uhuze n'abandi bubatsi.

empty.title: Nta bikorwa byabonetse
empty.description: Garuka vuba ku bikorwa bigiye kubaho!

header.title: Injira muri Claude Builder Club
header.subtitle: Tangira urugendo rwawe rwa AI hamwe n'umuryango ugushyigikira. Wige kubaka na Claude, ufatanye ku mishinga nyayo, kandi uhindure ejo hazaza rya AI mu Rwanda.

benefits.title: Icyo Uzabona
benefits.description: Nk'umunyamuryango wa CBC-UR, uzabona ibikoresho, ubuyobozi, n'amahirwe yateguwe kugira ngo ube umubatsi wa AI wizera.
benefits.workshops: Amahugurwa buri cyumweru n'amasomo yo kubaka
benefits.mentorship: Ubuyobozi buturuka ku bubatsi bazi byinshi

form.title: Ifishi yo Gusaba
form.whyJoinPlaceholder: Tubwire icyishimo cyawe ku bijyanye na AI n'icyo wizera kwiga...
form.aiExperience: Ni ubuhe burambe ufite muri AI?
form.aiExperiencePlaceholder: Uburambe ubufite ku bikoresho bya AI, gukora porogaramu, cyangwa ikoranabuhanga rijyanye...
form.disclaimer: Mu kohereza, wemera kwinjira mu itsinda ryacu rya WhatsApp no kubona amakuru y'ibikorwa.

success.title: Icyifuzo Cyoherejwe!
success.description: Urakoze gusaba kwinjira muri Claude Builder Club! Tuzasuzuma icyifuzo cyawe kandi tugusubize mu masaha 48 n'intambwe zikurikira.

footer.copyright: © 2026 Claude Builder Club — Kaminuza y'u Rwanda
